content.en: Video anomaly detection: Researchers have been exploring various machine learning techniques for anomaly detection in video surveillance. They have investigated advancements in anomaly detection in surveillance videos, as well as the use of deep learning approaches and spatiotemporal representation learning for video-based anomalous activity detection. Additionally, they have developed models such as 2D CNN and stacked LSTM with deep active learning-based models, novel two-stream structures, and optimization-enabled deep convolutional neural networks for advanced video anomaly detection in smart city management and traffic surveillance. These studies aim to develop efficient and robust deep learning-based methods for anomaly detection in video surveillance.
content.da: Videoanomali-detektering: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige maskinlæringsteknikker for anomalidetektering i videoovervågning. De har undersøgt fremskridt inden for anomalidetektering i overvågningsvideoer samt brugen af dyb læringstilgange og spatiotemporale repræsentationsindlæring til videobaseret anomalieaktivitetsdetektion. Derudover har de udviklet modeller såsom 2D CNN og stablet LSTM med dyb aktiv læringsbaserede modeller, nye to-strøm strukturer og optimeringsaktiverede dybe convolutions-neurale netværk til avanceret videoanomali-detektering i smart city management og trafikovervågning. Disse studier har til formål at udvikle effektive og robuste dyb læringsbaserede metoder til anomalidetektering i videoovervågning.
